title: Devon and Cornwall local elections 2017 results - BBC News
summary: police warn of 'dangerous ' pink pills thought to be ecstasy in north cornwall .
devon and cornwall local elections 2017 results .
- devon county council : conservatives keep control of 60-seat authority .
- cornwall council : conservatives win most seats but no overall control .
safes targeted in south hams burglaries .
hundreds of fishermen could be given free gps equipped life jackets in a bid to cut sea deaths .
tom daley in hospital ahead of wedding .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: our live coverage on election day
text: well that 's a day of elections over with large amounts of coffee and the occasional bit of chocolate duly dispatched .
we 've seen a straight conservative victory in devon and the conservatives winning the most seats in cornwall but without the numbers to take overall control .
we 'll be back at 08:00 on monday with all your news , sport , travel and weather .
author: Miles Davis
BBC News Online

documents.title: deals to be done this weekend
text: the tories are the largest group with 46 seats but they would need need 62 seats to have overall control of cornwall council .
they could form a minority administration or there could be deals to be done .
over the weekend there will be talks going on between all the main parties to decide who is going to be in charge for the next four years .
author: Tamsin Melville
Political Reporter, BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: 'strong endorsement for theresa may '
text: the conservative victory in cornwall is `` a strong endorsement for theresa may '' according to lelant and carbis bay councillor linda taylor .
she said success for 46 tory candidates out of 122 seats being contested was also an endorsement for the cornish conservative candidates in the general election .
she added : `` we are the largest party and it will be up to the leadership of the conservative group to sit down and make their decisions about the way forward . ''
author: Miles Davis
BBC News Online

documents.title: cornwall communities ban new-build second homes
text: two cornwall communities have voted to ban new-build second homes .
the parishes of st minver , which includes second home hot-spot rock , and rame peninsular approved the referendum to reserve new homes for full-time residents .
it follows a vote in st ives last year which also approved the same restrictions in a bid to curb house price rises and help local home-buyers .
that move was challenged in the high court by a developer but the referendum result was upheld .
author: Tamsin Melville
Political Reporter, BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: no lib dem 'surge ' in cornwall
text: the surge that had been hoped for by liberal democrat supporters did not materialise on the day .
the liberal democrats , who have been in charge of the authority in coalition with the independents , took 37 seats compared to 46 for the conservatives .
adam paynter , leader of the liberal democrats , said : `` it will be up to the conservatives to form the administration . ''
author: Tamsin Melville
Political Reporter, BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: cornwall council election : winners and losers
text: where we are now compared to 2013 :
author: Miles Davis
BBC News Online

documents.title: motorcyclist seriously injured in crash with car
text: a motorcyclist has been seriously injured in a crash with a car on the road between avonwick and totnes , police say .
officers said the rider was taken to derriford hospital in plymouth by air ambulance after the crash next to totnes christmas trees on higher plymouth road , totnes , at about 09:00 .
the female driver of the car sustained minor injuries .
police have appealed for the driver of a white van travelling from avonwick to totnes between 08:45 to 09:00 who may be a `` vital witness '' to come forward .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: breakingcornwall council election : tories gain most seats
text: the conservatives have won the most seats in the cornwall council elections , results show .
the tories have 46 out of the 122 seats up for grabs this week , with their nearest rivals being the liberal democrats with 37 seats , followed by 30 independent councillors .
labour have five seats and mebyon kernow four .
the unitary authority 's remaining 123rd seat , bodmin st petroc , will be contested at a later date .
it was delayed following the death of liberal democrat councillor steve rogerson .
although the tories have the most seats , they do not have overall control of the council .
the council had been led by a coalition of liberal democrats and independents since 2013 .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: breakingtories take cornwall
text: the conservatives have won the most seats in cornwall with 46 seats .
full results to follow shortly .
author: Miles Davis
BBC News Online

documents.title: man robs shop with 'machete '
text: a robber has stolen £ 200 to £ 300 worth of cash and goods after threatening staff and demanding money , tobacco and cigarettes while carrying a `` machete-type knife '' in a shop in plymouth , police say .
the premier store on regent street in the greenbank area was robbed at about 19:45 on thursday .
the man was described as 5ft 10in to 6ft tall , of medium build , and wearing a balaclava but `` appeared to have some kind of brown facial hair '' .
he also had a local accent .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: camps setting up for dartmoor 's ten tors
text: thousands of youngsters will be setting up camp near okehampton today ahead of this weekend 's ten tors challenge .

teams from all over the country are arriving in devon today for the event , which is organised by the army and sees teenagers taking on the elements on dartmoor during treks of 35 , 45 or 55 miles over two days .
the event starts at 07:00 on saturday .
author: BBC Spotlight

documents.title: devon elections 2017 : conservatives increase seats
text: voters have given the conservatives another four years in charge at devon county council .
the conservatives won 42 of the 60 seats , four more than they won at the last elections in 2013 .
they have been in control of the county council since wrestling it from the liberal democrats in 1989 .
labour and the liberal democrats have seven seats each , independents have three and the green party has one with ukip losing all its seats .
author: Jonathan Morris
BBC News Online

documents.title: two arrested after 'substantial ' suspected drugs seizure
text: two men have been arrested after armed police stop-checked a vehicle in cornwall and found a `` large amount of controlled drugs '' including what was believed to be cocaine .
police said the vehicle was stopped on the a30 at roche that was `` believed to be heading into newquay '' on thursday afternoon .

two men from newquay , aged 26 and 24 years , were arrested on sus of possession with intent to supply drugs , and a search of a property used by the men found suspected drugs and a large amount of cash , officers added .
the two were later released under investigation while further enquiries were being conducted into the `` substantial '' seizure , police said .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: cornwall council : conservatives on 40+ seats
text: the conservatives have tipped the 40-seat mark in the cornwall council elections , results show .
the tories have 41 out of the 122 seats up for grabs , with their nearest rivals being the liberal democrats with 35 seats , followed by 26 independent councillors .
labour have five seats and mebyon kernow four .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: child knocked down in camborne
text: a child has been knocked down on a road in camborne .
south terrace is closed in both directions between trevu road and wesley street due to the collision .
police said the road may be shut for some time .
the child 's condition is not known .
author: BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: latest weather : rain possible
text: after a bright evening in the east , it will become fairly cloudy overnight with a risk of the odd patch of rain moving in across southern and western areas .
however , the rest of the county should remain dry .
it will be milder than last night , although breezy .
minimum temperature : 7c ( 45f ) .
on saturday , rain is possible across some southern and western areas during the morning before petering out later .
otherwise it will be largely dry and fairly cloudy , with the best brightness in the east .
maximum temperature : 15c ( 59f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: elderly cat found with burns 'miles from home '
text: an 18-year-old cat has been found with burns and injuries more than two-and-a-half miles from her home in torbay after what is thought to have been a `` shocking and upsetting '' deliberate attack , the rspca says .
the animal welfare charity said spook was discovered injured with burns to her face , foot and around her bottom near goodrington beach on tuesday .
insp beccy wadey said : `` it is hard to imagine why anyone would want to deliberately hurt an animal in this horrific and callous way . ''
spook 's owner said his family was `` devastated '' by what had happened and appealed to for any information to help an investigation which could result in a prosecution .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: cornwall council : election map taken down
text: if you 've been trying to watch the live updates on the cornwall council elections , the council 's interactive map has been taken down due to technical issues , the authority says .
the results are still being published on its website .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: devon county council : tory vote up 10 % , ukip down 18 %
text: the conservatives in devon have seen an increase their vote in the devon county council elections of more than 10 % , while ukip has seen a drop of nearly 20 % .
the changes include :
author: Martyn Oates
BBC South West Political Editor

documents.title: cornwall council : tories and liberal democrats in tight race
text: the conservatives and liberal democrats are currently a running a tight race as to who will have the most seats on cornwall council , with the tories on 33 , just ahead of the liberal democrats with 30 .
independent councillors have just reached the 20s , with 21 seats held .
labour has five seats and mebyon kernow three .
former cornwall council leader john pollard has held his hayle north seat but announced he wo n't be running to lead the authority again .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: winds blow down trewithen trees
text: winds have been gradually strengthening with gales developing around exposed coasts through the day .
however , strong east , or north-easterly winds are due to gradually ease during the night to become light or moderate , away from the south coast by morning .
we 'll have a full forecast later .

documents.title: abuse images pc faces sack
text: a police officer who admitted downloading child abuse images is likely to be dismissed from the force , a court heard .

exeter-based pc jonathan fulcher , who is currently suspended , admitted three counts of making indecent images of children , one of possessing ammunition without a certificate , and one of possession of a noxious pava spray .
fulcher , 34 , of high road , crediton , denied attempting to cause a child to watch him perform a sexual act , but prosecutors are considering whether to proceed with the charge .
exeter crown court heard that four of the images were of the highest category , which shows children having sex with adults .
he will be sentenced at a later date .
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: cornwall council : labour holds two seats
text: labour has seen a hold in the gunnislake & calstock ward for dorothy kirk .
and former falmouth and camborne labour mp candy atherton has been re-elected to the falmouth seat .
author: Tamsin Melville
Political Reporter, BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: another labour seat in exeter
text: @ uklabour 's midas touch in exeter continues .
add another councillor to their clutch of six on @ twitterid # le2017
good news
now we need to get out there and campaign for llabour values , and then vote accordingly .

documents.title: lib dems ahead in cornwall
text: the liberal democrats are ahead in cornwall with 18 seats against 15 wins for the conservatives .
labour and mebyon kernow have up three seats each with the independents taking nine seats so far , according to cornwall council .
author: Miles Davis
BBC News Online

documents.title: rugby union premiership : home comfort for exeter ?
text: there is still everything to play for in rugby union as the premiership enters its final round .
so who is going to enjoy the home comforts on 20 may ?
if premiership leaders wasps beat reigning champions saracens at the ricoh arena , wasps and exeter will get home ties .
if exeter overcome gloucester at kingsholm , they will guarantee themselves a play-off match in the south west , but their fate could be decided in coventry .
you can find out more here .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: delays on council results website
text: the `` extremely high demand '' for information on the cornwall council election results website is causing delays .

text: overheard at the count : `` it 's funny seeing people in daylight you 've previously only seen at night '' .
overheard at the count : `` i hate counts .
i see so many people i dislike .
and not all of them from other parties . ''

documents.title: ukip lose seats
text: ukip lose all four seats on devon county council .

documents.title: cornwall council : tories and liberal democrats take four seats each
text: conservatives and the liberal democrats in cornwall have won four seats each in the local elections so far .
the tories ' victories include taking camborne treslothan from labour , liskeard north from the independents and st blazey from the liberal democrats .
they have also gained st stephen in brannel .
the liberal democrats have bodmin st leonard , newquay central , st austell bethel and wadebridge east .
meanwhile .
mebyon kernow have held callington , their second seat .
independent mark kaczmarek has taken carharrack , gwennap & st day .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: conservatives make gains in cornwall
text: it 's very early days , but so far it 's the conservatives who are making gains , the lib dems are holding seats # le2017 @ twitterid

Political Reporter, BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: mum 's warning after son dies of tragic 'dead in bed ' syndrome
text: the family of a young man who died to a little-known `` dead in bed '' syndrome have spoken out to makes others aware of the complication .
author: Devon Live

documents.title: latest travel in devon
text: latest travel in devon
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: cornwall council : are there enough colours for all the parties on the map ?
text: local journalist graham smith explains .
when # cornwall re-colours its political map it might need a whole box of felt-tips , wide variety of candidates who have colours to match .
author: Louise Walter
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: fire in tiverton house 's community room
text: a fire in a community room at a house in tiverton last night is being investigated .
fire crews went to brewin road just after 23:30 where they found a fire on the ground floor .
the room was 30 % damaged by fire .
there was also heat and smoke damage , firefighters said .
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: devon county council : liberal democrats take new devon ward
text: the liberal democrats have taken devon county council 's new ipplepen & the kerswells ward .
the ward includes part of what had been the former kingsteignton ward before changes recommended by the boundary commission .
the kingsteignton ward had been a ukip seat .
however , ukip has failed to repeat its previous success in the area in this election , coming bottom of the poll with 3 % of the vote .
in other wards , the conservatives have been building on their earlier successes :

other parties have seen some success : barnstaple north has been taken by brian greenslade for the liberal democrats , labour 's rob hannaford has exwick & st. thomas and independent claire wright took otter valley .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: cornwall council : mebyon kernow leader gets seven times the votes of nearest rival
text: cornwall political party leader dick cole has a very comfortable hold for st enoder ward in the county elections , getting seven times as many votes as his nearest rival .
the mebyon kernow chief polled 1,090 votes , well ahead of the conservatives ' rachel andrews , who had 143 ballots .
cole saw an increased majority .
author: Tamsin Melville
Political Reporter, BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: breakingdevon county council : conservatives keep control of 60-seat authority
text: confirmed - conservatives hold control on devon county council .
what the hell do the tories have to do before people stop voting for them ?
euthenasia for the over 70s ?
arrgh !
bloody tories !

documents.title: latest weather : continuing dry , but rain possible overnight
text: it will continue dry , but cloudy at times , although some brighter spells and sunny periods will develop .
it will also be windy with fresh to strong easterly winds up to gale force along exposed parts of the south coast and towards the isles of scilly .
maximum temperature : 15c ( 59f ) .
tonight will remain dry with some clear spells , but cloud and some occasionally heavy rain will move in to the isles of scilly and west cornwall during the evening .
strong east or northeasterly winds will gradually ease during the night to become light or moderate away from the south coast by morning .
minimum temperature : 7c ( 45f ) .
author: Kevin Thomas
BBC Weather Forecaster

documents.title: first election result for cornwall council
text: cornwall council 's first result is newquay central , and it 's a liberal democrat hold for former council cabinet member geoff brown .
a lib dem hold at the first declaration from the wadebridge count .
newquay central ward .
author: BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: devon county council : former mp younger-ross loses seat
text: former liberal democrat teignbridge mp richard younger-ross ( has lost his seat on devon county council .
just 22 votes separated him and the conservative winner of the teignmouth ward :
more than 4,300 votes were cast .
author: Martyn Oates
BBC South West Political Editor

text: at kennford , the a38 plymouth-bound is blocked due to an accident .
traffic is queueing .

documents.title: devon county council : more conservative wins , but labour get second seat
text: the conservatives are continuing to mount up the number of seats they 've won in the devon county council election , including :
labour has had another win , with emma brennan taking heavitree & whipton barton .

documents.title: ukip party leader at devon county council loses seat

documents.title: devon county council : labour has first declared win
text: labour has had its first declared win in the devon county council elections .
yvonne atkinson has taken the alphington & cowick ward with a majority of more than 420 out of the 4,500 total votes cast .
looking at north devon , conservative paul crabb has won ilfracombe .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: devon county council : conservatives win salcombe
text: conservative rufus gilbert is elected to represent the salcombe ward of devon county council with a majority of more 1,300 .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: rugby union premiership : home play-off for exeter ?
text: after eight months of hard graft , bruises and broken bones , there is still everything to play for as the premiership enters its final round .

three teams are battling to finish top of the table , bath and leicester will fight it out for the all-important fourth play-off spot and another trio of sides can earn themselves a european champions cup place for next season .
the only certainty is that bottom side bristol are already relegated .
sport takes a closer look at how things could shape up once the final whistle blows on saturday , including how things could develop for exeter .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: devon county council election : axminster and feniton & honiton winners both new conservative councillors
text: ian hall has won axminster 's devon county council seat with 47 % of the vote .
he and now feniton & honiton councillor phil twiss are both new conservative councillors on the 60-seat authority .
meanwhile , andrew leadbetter has retained his seat for conservative wearside & topsham .
independent frank biederman has retained his seat at fremington rural .
author: Anna Varle
BBC South West

documents.title: cornwall council election : ballot count 'due to start at about 13:00 '
text: verification of ballots for the cornwall council election is still continuing at the royal cornwall showground in wadebridge .
it 's estimated that that the counts themselves will begin at about 13:00 .
author: Tamsin Melville
Political Reporter, BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: devon county council : tories win feniton & honiton
text: phil twiss takes devon county council 's feniton & honiton ward for the conservatives with a majority of more than 1,300 .

documents.title: serious road collision at harberton , near totnes
text: gosworthy farm , harberton .
serious collision we are closing the road fm fork cross to shorter cross .
please find alternative route hg

documents.title: new £ 1.2m venue at devon 's rosemoor garden
text: the royal horticultural society has invested £ 1.2m into a new venue for the rosemoor garden in north devon .
the garden room is officially opening at the site in torrington later and will be used for events , including concerts after being designed to blend in with the landscape , staff said .
those in charge added that it was a significant investment into the south west 's tourism industry and they expected it to bring more people to the region .
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: exeter chiefs ' scrum half hayden thomas leaving club
text: exeter chiefs ' longest-serving player is hanging up his boots after 14 years with the club .
scrum half hayden thomas is the last remaining chief to have played at the old county ground .
he said : `` i 've been looking to finish for a while now and move on to coaching - i 've been doing a lot of work with the academy .
`` it 's just the right time .
my body 's still in a reasonable state , and i thought i 'd rather go out on my own terms . ''
author: Gordon Sparks
Presenter, BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: rail signal issues resolved
text: the signalling problem at # liskeard has been resolved and trains are running normally between plymouth to bodmin parkway .

documents.title: local election ballot verification and counts begin in cornwall
text: local election ballot verification and counts have begun in cornwall .
we 'll bring you the latest results for the authority 's 122 seats up for grabs as the day goes on .
author: BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: weatherman kevin receives royal navy service medal
text: we 've celebrated a life on the ocean wave this morning , with our very own weatherman , kevin thomas , receiving the royal navy 's volunteer reserve service medal .
as you may know , kevin used to be a lieutenant commander in the royal navy as a meteorologist .

the medal , for outstanding service in the royal navy reserve , was presented on air on bbc radio cornwall by commander jason phillips , from rnas culdrose , while kevin was on air with james churchfield and mel osborne .
and it 's been inspiring him for the rest of the morning in the newsroom , as he 's kept it by his keyboard .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: a3075 closed after three-vehicle road crash near goonhavern
text: the a3075 has been closed in both directions after a three-vehicle road crash at goonhavern .
ambulance crews are dealing with casualties , it is understood .
police have said drivers should seek alternate route .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: tom daley in hospital for hips treatment
text: plymouth diver tom daley has been in hospital for treatment to his hips , he has revealed on social media .
the two-time 22-year-old olympic medallist shared a of himself in a hospital bed on instagram and twitter , saying `` what does n't kill you makes you stronger '' .
he later tweeted a reply to one concerned follower : `` i 'm getting old my hips needed some help '' .
the treatment comes before his wedding to 42-year-old american screenwriter dustin lance black , which is due to be held this weekend .

documents.title: devon county council expected to announce local election results first
text: devon county council and cornwall council election results are due today .
devon county council had all its votes verified last night , so it should be the first to announce its results .
verification involves checking that the number of ballot papers in any ballot box matches the number of ballot papers issued , according to the electoral commission .
author: Martyn Oates
BBC South West Political Editor

documents.title: safes targeted in south hams burglaries
text: a series of burglaries have been carried out in the south hams area , seeing cash stolen `` particularly from safes '' , police say .
kingsbridge police said on facebook businesses should `` ensure your security is thorough '' after the premises were broken into .
officers said : `` we would recommend that only a limited and necessary amount of cash is kept on your premises and bank the excess as often as possible to minimise any possible theft . ''
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: where is the range owner chris dawson on the sunday times rich list 2017 ?
text: the owner of the range empire , devon 's chris dawson , has cemented his place on the sunday times rich list by adding another £ 150m to his fortune in the last 12 months .
author: Devon Live

documents.title: council applies for £ 100k for locator-equipped life jackets
text: a scheme believed to be the first in the country to provide hundreds of fishermen with free gps equipped life jackets has moved a step closer to becoming a reality .
plymouth city council has applied for more than £ 100,000 of european funding to pay for 250 jackets , which have a personal locator beacon fitted to them .
the marine accident investigation branch looked into six fatal overboard accidents from fishing boats last year .
four of those fishermen were not wearing a life jacket .
authorities said the jackets would enable coastguards to locate casualties within 20m of their coordinates .
author: BBC Spotlight

documents.title: what was your polling station like ?
text: one of our more glamorous polling station locations - a 19th century castle !

documents.title: machete wielding robber hunted by armed police in plymouth
text: armed response officers have been scouring the city centre after a masked man wielding a machete robbed a convenience store .
author: Plymouth Herald

documents.title: woman detained under mental health act after climbing on church roof
text: a woman has been detained under the mental health act after climbing on to the roof of a church in devon , police say .
officers in kingsbridge said on facebook that they were called to a concern for welfare incident in dartmouth town centre at about 05:00 .
police said : `` negotiations took place and a female was brought down safely . ''
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: cornwall council will have 122 of 123 seats filled
text: only election results for 122 of cornwall council 's 123 seats will be declared today .
one contest , in bodmin st petroc , has been delayed following the death of liberal democrat councillor steve rogerson .
the council has been led by a coalition of liberal democrats and independents since 2013 .
author: Andrew Segal
Local Live

documents.title: elderly woman 'mislays car '
text: we have been made aware that an elderly female has mislaid her silver suzuki y675fod in the overbecks area if sighted call 101 log 678 04/05

documents.title: diver tom daley shares from hospital bed
text: plymouth diver tom daley has concerned fans by sharing a of himself in a hospital bed ahead of his wedding .
the photo of the two-time 22-year-old olympic medallist was posted on instagram and twitter .
he wrote : `` what does n't kill you makes you stronger . ''
with the hash tag # atheletelife .
he also says `` back on the board soon . ''
his orignal tweet made no reference to what caused his admission to hospital .
the image comes as newspapers report he is marrying his fiance , 42-year-old american screenwriter dustin lance black , this weekend .
what does n't kill you makes you stronger !
# athletelife back on the board soon
you 're literally the only person i know that would still look good and happy in a hospital hope everything is alright !
